fields.name: Golden Arc
fields.description: Once per scene, a thrown Spin projectile returns. On a 6, it may hit a second target. On a crit, +1 effect or +1d to the return strike.

fields.name: Vibrational Scan
fields.description: Use a spinning object to perform a Study or Survey roll. +1 effect when detecting structure, weak points, or lifeforms.

fields.name: Kinetic Tether
fields.description: Spin threads can connect two objects. Once per score, create a tether that allows movement, redirection, or restraint. +1d when using it for repositioning or rescue.

fields.name: Rebound Tactics
fields.description: +1d on attacks that ricochet. On a 6, you may apply splash harm (Level 1, close-range). On a crit, treat it as Level 2.

fields.name: Precision Pulse
fields.description: Use Spin to bypass mechanical locks or triggers. Treat as Tinker with +1 effect. Costs 1 stress if disabling advanced systems or supernatural barriers.

fields.name: Reflective Barrier
fields.description: Spin two objects at high frequency to bend light or sound. Once per score, redirect a single ranged attack or sound-based effect. Must be declared before the GM reveals the consequence.

fields.name: Aesthetic Surge
fields.description: Use Spin to manipulate appearance. Once per scene, you may alter visible features or resonance for disguise or subterfuge. +1 effect on Sway or Consort for misdirection.

fields.name: Gyroscopic Mount
fields.description: +1 effect to movement or melee Spin rolls when mounted or piloting.

fields.name: Signal Pulse
fields.description: Once per score, issue a one-word command to your mount, no matter the distance.

fields.name: Stirrup Surge
fields.description: +1d on Skirmish while charging. On a 6, gain a knockback effect. On a crit, Level 2 harm and position upgrade (Risky â†’ Controlled).
